9118.title: This service respects your browser's Do Not Track (DNT) headers

tosdr.case: This service respects your browser's Do Not Track (DNT) headers
tosdr.tldr: Privacy policy states "Do Not Track. Most browsers also allow you to change the browser settings to send a “Do Not Track” request to websites you visit."
